<Text: The Mourne Mountains ( ; Irish: "na Beanna Boirche" ), also called the Mournes or Mountains of Mourne, are a granite mountain range in County Down in the south-east of Northern Ireland.>

Text: Mourne Mountains:  The highest of these is Slieve Donard at 850 m .

3:
--------------------
Text: Mourne Mountains:  The Mournes is an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty and has been proposed as the first national park in Northern Ireland.
Triplets:<The Mournes
4:
--------------------
Text: Mourne Mountains:  The area is partly owned by the National Trust and sees a large number of visitors every year.
